seo.title: Conecio - Digital Marketing & Innovation Agency
seo.description: Conecio is an innovative digital marketing agency that supports you in your digital transformation with tailor-made solutions: SEO, web design, social media, content marketing and more.
seo.keywords: digital marketing agency, SEO, web design, social media, content marketing, digital transformation, digital innovation, digital strategy
seo.structured_desc: Innovative digital marketing agency specializing in digital transformation

cta.title: Have a project in mind?
cta.desc: Let's discuss it! We are ready to help you bring your vision to life.
cta.img_alt: Illustration of a rocket for the call to action

services.section_desc: Tailor-made solutions to boost your business with a modern, technical and refined style.
services.slide_1_desc: Websites, landing pages, custom experience for your business.
services.slide_2_desc: Logos, brand guidelines, impactful visuals for your brand.
services.slide_3_desc: Digital advertising (Meta Ads, Google Ads), boost your visibility.
services.slide_4_desc: Project management, monitoring, reporting and continuous optimization.

seo_sem.title: SEO & SEM
seo_sem.description: Optimize your visibility and reach the top of search results
seo_sem.detailedDescription: Our SEO & SEM service combines organic optimization and paid advertising to maximize your online visibility. We thoroughly analyze your site, identify improvement opportunities, and implement personalized strategies to boost your search engine ranking. Our data-driven approach allows us to precisely measure the impact of our actions and continuously adjust our strategy for better results.
seo_sem.sectionDescription: A comprehensive approach to dominate search results and maximize your online presence

web_design.title: Web Design
web_design.description: Create a digital presence that captivates and converts
web_design.detailedDescription: Our Web Design service goes beyond just building websites. We design immersive digital experiences that capture your visitors' attention and naturally guide them toward conversion. Every element is crafted to optimize the user experience, from subtle animations to intuitive navigation and clear, engaging content architecture.
web_design.sectionDescription: Websites that combine aesthetics and performance for an optimal user experience

marketing_mobile.title: Mobile Marketing
marketing_mobile.description: Connect with your audience wherever they are
marketing_mobile.detailedDescription: In a world where mobile is the first point of contact with your clients, our Mobile Marketing service helps you reach your audience at the right time, in the right place. We develop mobile-first strategies, optimize your campaigns for mobile devices, and create seamless user experiences that convert.
marketing_mobile.sectionDescription: A mobile-centric approach to reach your audience everywhere

social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.description: Engage your community on social networks
social_media.detailedDescription: Our Social Media service turns your social networks into real growth drivers. We create and manage your presence on the most relevant platforms for your sector, develop engaging content that resonates with your audience, and build an active community around your brand. Our data-driven approach allows us to measure the impact of every action and continuously optimize your strategy.
social_media.sectionDescription: A dynamic social presence that engages and retains your audience

content_creator.title: Content Creator
content_creator.description: Create engaging content for all your channels
content_creator.detailedDescription: Our Content Creator service helps you tell your story in a captivating way across different formats and channels. We create content that not only informs and entertains your audience but also strengthens your position as an expert in your field. Our strategic approach ensures that every piece of content contributes to your business goals while engaging your audience.
content_creator.sectionDescription: Content that tells your story and strengthens your expert position

ux_ui_design.title: UX/UI Design
ux_ui_design.detailedDescription: Our UX/UI Design service combines aesthetics and functionality to create interfaces that are not only visually pleasing but also intuitive and efficient. We put the user at the center of our design process, creating smooth and enjoyable experiences that facilitate navigation and increase engagement. Our iterative approach allows us to continuously refine the design based on user feedback.
ux_ui_design.sectionDescription: Interfaces that combine beauty and functionality for an optimal user experience

innovation_digitale.title: Digital Innovation
innovation_digitale.description: Stay ahead with the latest technologies
innovation_digitale.detailedDescription: Our Digital Innovation service helps you stay competitive in a constantly evolving world. We identify and integrate emerging technologies that can transform your business, from artificial intelligence to augmented reality. Our pragmatic approach allows us to implement innovative solutions that deliver tangible results while preparing your company for tomorrow's challenges.
innovation_digitale.sectionDescription: Cutting-edge technologies to transform your business and stay competitive

promote.desc: We create and manage your advertising campaigns on Meta (Facebook/Instagram) and Google Ads, with visuals optimized for conversion. Each message is clear, targeted, and designed to maximize your results.

manage.desc: From content creation to publication planning, we ensure smooth management of your social networks. We set up clear and effective dashboards to track your results and adjust your strategy in real time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions by topic.

questions.question: How does Conecio stand out from other digital agencies?
questions.answer: Conecio stands out through its holistic and personalized approach. We combine technical expertise, creativity, and business strategy to create digital solutions that deliver real results. Our team of certified experts and proven methodology allow us to offer premium support and measurable outcomes.

questions.question: What is your approach to developing a digital project?
questions.answer: Our methodology consists of 4 key phases: 1) In-depth analysis of your needs and business objectives, 2) Development of a tailor-made strategy, 3) Implementation of solutions, 4) Ongoing monitoring and optimization. Each phase is documented and validated with you to ensure perfect alignment with your goals.

questions.question: How long does it take to create a website?
questions.answer: The duration depends on the type of site and the complexity of the project. A showcase site usually takes 4 to 6 weeks, while an e-commerce site may require 8 to 12 weeks. We provide you with a precise schedule from the start.

questions.question: What are your prices and payment methods?
questions.answer: Our prices are transparent and tailored to each project. We offer personalized quotes based on your specific needs. Payments are staggered according to project progress, with monthly or annual maintenance options. Contact us for a detailed quote tailored to your goals.

questions.question: Do you offer solutions for small businesses?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We have developed solutions adapted to the budgets and needs of SMEs. Our flexible packages allow you to start with the essentials and gradually develop your digital presence. We believe every business deserves an effective digital strategy, whatever its size.

questions.question: What factors influence the price of a website?
questions.answer: The price depends on several criteria: type of site (showcase, e-commerce, custom), number of pages, specific features, custom design, third-party integrations, etc. We always provide a detailed and transparent quote.

questions.question: What types of services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a full range of digital services: website creation, SEO, SEA, social media management, branding, analytics, advertising campaigns, and more. We tailor each service to your specific needs.

questions.question: What are your average lead times for a website project?
questions.answer: Lead times vary depending on the complexity of the project. A showcase site usually takes 4-6 weeks, an e-commerce site 8-12 weeks. We establish a detailed schedule from the start and provide regular follow-up to meet deadlines.

questions.question: Do you build high-performance e-commerce sites?
questions.answer: Yes, we design online stores optimized for conversion, security, and inventory management. We integrate the best payment solutions and offer scalable options to support your growth.

questions.question: Do you offer custom design services?
questions.answer: Our design team creates unique, modern interfaces tailored to your brand image. We focus on user experience (UX) and aesthetics to maximize your site's impact.

questions.question: What is your maintenance and support policy?
questions.answer: We provide responsive technical support 24/7, regular updates, automatic backups, and preventive maintenance. Our clients have access to a dedicated portal to track their project and submit requests.

questions.question: How does project tracking work?
questions.answer: A dedicated project manager supports you at every stage. You receive regular updates, detailed reports, and can track progress in real time via our platform.

questions.question: Do you offer SEO services to improve visibility?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer SEO audits, technical optimization, content writing, link building, and ranking monitoring. Our goal is to sustainably increase your qualified traffic.

questions.question: How do you ensure the security of my clients' data?
questions.answer: Security is at the heart of our concerns. We implement the latest security standards (GDPR, SSL, encryption), conduct regular audits, and train our clients in best practices. Our solutions are hosted on secure servers and we guarantee complete data confidentiality.

questions.question: Are you GDPR compliant?
questions.answer: Yes, all our solutions are designed to be GDPR compliant. We also support our clients in ensuring their own digital tools are compliant.

faq.help_title: Still have questions or need help?
faq.help_commercial: Write to us at conecioagency@gmail.com for any business inquiry.
faq.help_tech: For technical issues, please contact support. (If you need to share private information, you can also write to us here.)
